price: 12. Ama Qhiyaamah ayro tanim dirabbossa koros jahannam gira xer-ikkeek ken tabic waqdi usun is muxiyyi gibdah abta xongolo teetik yaabben is keenih abta naqabih gibdah.
arabic: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idhā ra-athum min makānin baʿīdin samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓan wazafīran
